document.full_text: imf head dominique strauss-kahn was taken into custody on saturday at jfk international airport in new york and was being questioned in regard to a sexual assault, new york police spokesman paul browne told reuters.
document.title: ny police confirm imf head strauss-kahn in custody
lines_and_colors: imf head dominique strauss-kahn was taken into custody on saturday at jfk international airport in new york and was being questioned in regard to a sexual assault, new york police spokesman paul browne told reuters.
